#define AFFY_GUID_FORMAT_RFC4122   1
 /// RFC4122 v4 Guid => 09fdee5a-b19e-4101-0668-0840519ad701 /// Classic APT Guid => 0000007361-1232759575-1336980168-0774759233-0407464966 /// /// The format of the guids affxutil::GenerateNewGuid() will make. /// Comment it out for the old format.
